string.name: reason_background
string.value: Used for audio playback and recording scenarios, keeping audio playing in the background and recording running in the background

string.name: reason_microphone
string.value: Apply for microphone recording for recording scenarios

string.name: detection_description
string.value: Audio applications need to detect a total of 13 scenes, of which 3 scenes are mandatory. If skipped, all scores for that scene will be deducted; The remaining 10 scenes are non mandatory scenes. If skipped, the scene cannot be scored and the total score does not include the scene score.

string.name: skip_dialog_title
string.value: Confirm to skip this detection item?

string.name: skip_dialog_content
string.value: After skipping the detection, this item will not be rated.

string.name: sound_recording_forbidden_tips
string.value: This feature requires microphone permission to be activated before it can be used. Please click the "OK" button again, bring up the permission pop-up window, and allow the permission to be detected.

string.name: confirm_service_dial_ok_content
string.value: 1.Please confirm that the detected application has been placed in the background and started playing; 2.Please confirm if the local phone number has been called

string.name: confirm_service_dial_wrong_content
string.value: Please insert the SIM card and continue testing

string.name: score_congratulations
string.value: Congratulations on completion; total score is

string.name: export_csv_hint
string.value: Exporting the file will generate a CSV file, which needs to be opened using WPS or exported to a PC to open

string.name: export_log_guide_title
string.value: You can export the logs in the following ways

string.name: export_log_guide_1
string.value: One: Export hilog logs to the current directory through hdc

string.name: export_log_guide_1_2
string.value: 2.There are files such as "hilog. xxx. yyyMMMDD-ss. gz" in the local hilog (yyyyMMDD-ss is the time), just find the compressed file that is close to the operation time.

string.name: export_log_guide_2
string.value: Two: Export hilog logs to the current directory through DevEco Studio

string.name: export_log_guide_2_1
string.value: 1.Open DevEco Studio and click on the Device File Browser in the bottom right corner;

string.name: export_log_guide_2_2
string.value: 2.Open the hilog directory according to the path 'data/log/hilog';

string.name: export_log_guide_2_3
string.value: 3.In the hilog directory, there are files such as "hilog. xxx. yyyMMMDD-ss. gz" (yyyyMMDD-ss is the time), just find the compressed file that is close to the operation time.
